page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT IN CHAGFORD
page.content: There are no theatres, cinemas,dance or bingo halls in Chagford. However, entertainment is provided in a variety of ways. For instance, young people may attend a{Disco}at weekends at either the{Three Crowns Hotel}or at the{Globe Hotel. }In the Jubilee Hall there are periodic{Folk Festivals, {Dances, visiting Theatre Group plays, {Pantomimes}and displays by{local {groups.} A local group of performers called { {The Goliards}present musicals and plays at Shilstone, where recitals arranged by the owner, Rev. J. Jory, also take place. {Bingo sessions}take place weekly in the Jubilee Hall and on special occasions in other places.
